thread.title: Lenovo K6 Power 4GB RAM variant launching on January 31st for Rs 10,999
thread.title_full: Lenovo K6 Power 4GB RAM variant launching on January 31st for Rs 10,999

title: Lenovo K6 Power 4GB RAM variant launching on January 31st for Rs 10,999
text:
Lenovo K6 Power 4GB RAM variant launching on January 31st for Rs... Lenovo K6 Power 4GB RAM variant launching on January 31st for Rs 10,999 By - January 24, 2017 “The K6 Power will now be available in 3GB and 4GB RAM variants in the country” 
Lenovo unveiled the K6 Power at IFA in September last year, and launched the phone in India in November. The brand had launched the K6 Power in the country with 3GB of RAM, priced at Rs 9,999. Today, the company has announced the launch of a slightly upgraded variant of the phone in the country, which comes with a beefier 4GB of RAM. The new model of the handset has been priced at Rs 10,999, and will be available exclusively on Flipkart starting January 31st at 12 pm. 
Apart from higher RAM, the rest of the specs of the new Lenovo K6 Power ( first impressions ) are the same as the 3GB RAM model. The phone features a 5-inch 1080p display, and boots Android Marshmallow. It is powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 processor, and features 32GB of expandable storage. The device comes with a 13MP rear snapper, an 8MP front shooter, an all-metal body, a fingerprint sensor, Dolby Atmos-powered speakers, 4G, VoLTE and a beefy 4,000mAh battery. Facebook Comments
